SocialMediaPosting.headline: Mrs. Desiree Matia’s Story - Pittsburgh Educator - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope that my students will build the confidence and agency through the Arts and create positive change in their world…”

– Mrs. Desiree Matia, Art Educator @PropelSchools @CCAC @IUPedu @SCADdotedu https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/students-build-confidence-agency-arts-create-positive-change/
